ai.nettogrof.battlesnake.treesearch.search.squad.AbstractSquadNode
Direct Known Subclasses:
SquadNode
public abstract class AbstractSquadNode
extends DuelNode
This abstract squad node class is the based of all node class, provide basic method use in any node for squad rules.
Version:
Spring 2021
Author:
carl.lajeunesse
